about_the_game:
Time for a sweet retreat! Grab your pocket change and satisfy your sweet tooth with the Candy Shop tileset!

The Candy Shop tileset includes:

Ground tiles:

Plain white floor
Golden floor
Large tile floors in white, gold, pink and purple
Candy-color accent tiles
Small tiles in multiple color choices
Diamond tiles in white, gold, pink and purple

Wall Tiles:

Small tile pattern
Windows (lots of colors, with border color choices)
Plain walls in lots of colors
Striped walls
Wall-high candy dispensers
Includes flat roof, wood roof, awning tiles, shingle and clay tile roof in lots of colors!

Also includes:

Tons of candy and other confections! Several styles of clear jars with colorful candies inside
Plus candy to decorate with
Vending machines
Signage
Storefronts
Awnings
Pillars
Colorful buntings
More windows with more colors
Tons of curved counters
Open/closed signs
Utility items like registers, ATM and more!

Events and Animations

Doors in tons of colors! 7 styles total!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
